All Together  Dead
Betrayed by her longtime vampire love, Louisiana cocktail waitress Sookie Stackhouse must now not only deal with a possible new man in her lifeÃ¢â‚¬â€the oh-so-handsome shapeshifter QuinnÃ¢â‚¬â€but also contend with a long-planned vampire summit. And her choice may mean the difference between survival and all-out catastrophe
